description:
The DAG-2.2 Gauge provides fast and precise adjustments for your rear derailleur to keep it aligned and running smooth.

  • Adjustment bar is made of heavy gauge, chrome plated steel
  • Adjusts to fit 20 to 29in.+ wheels
  • Replaceable threaded tip
  • Tight tolerances for precise readings
  • O-ring reference guides lets you work around obstructions, like racks or fenders, without needing to remove them
  • Fits a variety of frame/hanger combinations, including low clearance thru-axle derailleur hangers
name: Park Tool DAG-2.2 Derailleur Alignment Gauge
